TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapIgnoreAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: Instructs the not to serialize the public field or public read/write property value.

span.span: Instructs the not to serialize the public field or public read/write property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別屬於一系列屬性可控制如何序列化或還原序列化的物件做為編碼的 SOAP XML。The class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML. 所產生的 XML 符合全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 文件，而 「 簡單物件存取通訊協定 (SOAP) 1.1 」 的第 5 節。The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1". 如需類似屬性的完整清單，請參閱[屬性，控制編碼 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md). 若要序列化的物件做為編碼的 SOAP 訊息，您必須建構使用以建立方法類別。To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the using an created with the method of the class. 套用您想要的任何類別成員類別的執行個體序列化時略過。Apply the to any class member that you want the to ignore when an instance of the class is serialized. 例如，您可能時執行此動作的成員用來包含要序列化之物件的相關中繼資料。For example, you may do this when the member is used to contain metadata about the object being serialized. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用 word`SoapIgnore`取代較長程式碼中。You can use the word `SoapIgnore` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`欄位和成員`GroupType`列舉型別會覆寫。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已建立，且每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別、以適當的屬性設定，然後新增至建立。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用建立，而且用來建立會覆寫預設的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`欄位和成員`GroupType`列舉型別會覆寫。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已建立，且每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別、以適當的屬性設定，然後新增至建立。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用建立，而且用來建立會覆寫預設的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization.
